title: If Wakanda has really advanced technology, they should know that there is a stronger metal called adamantium. Why didn’t they use it? - Quora

response.answer_text: this is fiction. Plot features that provide good drama are prioritized over plot features that make sense.Ignoring that, Adamantium is supposed to be rare. If what they have ”easy” access to is good enough, why spend the extra effort on something better?
